contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Iijima |JapaneseName= 飯島町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Iijima in Nagano Prefecture Ja.svg |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] |Prefecture= [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]] |District= [[Kamiina District, Nagano|Kamiina]] |ImageSkyline= |ImageCaption= |Area_km2= 86.94 |PopDate= 2008 |Population= 10,527 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 35 |LatitudeMinutes= 41 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 137 |LongtitudeMinutes= 55 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.iijima.nagano.jp/ Town of Iijima] }} {{nihongo|'''Iijima'''|飯島町|Iijima-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kamiina District, Nagano|Kamiina District]], [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]], [[Japan]]. It is bordered by [[Nakagawa, Nagano|Nakagawa]] to the east, [[Komagane, Nagano|Komagane]] to the north, [[Ōkuwa, Nagano|Ōkuwa]] to the west, and [[Matsukawa, Nagano (Shimoina)|Matsukawa]] and [[Iida, Nagano|Iida]] to the south. As of 2008, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 10,527 and a [[population density|density]] of 121 persons per km². The total area is 86.94 km². == External links == {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.town.iijima.nagano.jp/ Iijima official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Nagano Prefecture]] {{Nagano-geo-stub}}
